GHOST SDK Reference Manual

III - GHOST VRML Reader

gstVRMLErrorClass to handle VRML file reading errors.
gstReadVRMLFileRead a VRML 2 file and convert into a GHOST scene graph.
gstVRMLClearErrorsClear all errors.
gstVRMLGetEarliestErrorGet earliest error.
gstVRMLGetErrorGet earliest error, return no error if none.
gstVRMLGetErrorTypeNameConvert error type to string representation.
gstVRMLGetLatestErrorGet latest error.
gstVRMLGetNumErrorsHow many errors.
gstVRMLPopEarliestErrorGet earliest and remove it from list.
gstVRMLPopLatestErrorGet latest and remove it from list.
gstVRMLPushError
gstVRMLWriteErrorsToFileDump errors to given filename.
gstVRMLErrorTypeThe possible error types during the GHOST VRML reading process.
